review_text: Great place. The space is very efficient and quiet inside. Wonderful host too.
Absolutely wonderful stay!!
Very pleasant stay at Vickie's place. There were a lot of nice touches in the apartment such as the snacks and the sparkling water she left in the fridge.
It was a great stay. very happy & she was very accommodating. would stay again in a heartbeat. thankyou vickie!❤️

My daughter and I stayed at Vickie's Loft for a long weekend, and it was perfect! The space was super clean and cozy, and it was walkable to downtown where there are plenty of restaurants and shops. Thanks, Vickie, for letting us stay at your place!
The place was very nice. It had many windows and open spaces.
We had a great stay and Vickie was incredibly helpful and responsive with all communication.
This was perfect! Had a great, easy stay.
Vickie was a great host and very communicative. Her apartment location is ideal and very close to downtown, can easily walk to all the shops and restaurants. Would definitely stay again!

Amazing place to stay at if you are visiting Glens Falls. Cozy house with everything you need.
Thank you, Vickie!
This place is a gem run by a super responsive host. Spotlessly clean and exactly as advertised top to bottom.
This was the 2nd time we stayed here - clean, comfortable, great location. Recommend highly!
Vickie was quick to reply to several questions. Bed was extremely comfortable and parking was easy. Thank you for an introduction to Glens Falls!

Perfect Airbnb and host. Excellent communication from booking and throughout our stay. Walking distance to restaurants and downtown. The loft is nicely decorated with everything you could possibly need during your stay. The coffee and special treats were very much appreciated. Parking is on-site and entry into the apartment was super easy. The washer and dryer were a huge plus. I highly recommend Vickie’s Loft – your home away from home.
Immaculate, beautifully decorated, super comfortable beds and great host

We stayed at Vickie’s place for a wedding we had nearby and it was perfect for our night in town! Vickie was gracious enough to allow for us to check-in two hours early to get ready for the 4pm event and the place was pristine, beds cozy, good shower pressure, nice linens, and in a cool part of Glens Falls! We didn’t get much time to explore the area but we’d love to visit again sometime. Would highly recommend to any guest!

We really enjoyed our stay at The Loft. It's on a quiet street, opposite where the Farmer's Market is held at the weekend. Fairly nondescript from the outside, but the inside is delightful—clean, well appointed, more spacious than the photos would suggest. Everything stocked well. Kitchen was well equipped. And we loved how close the place is to everything downtown: we could just walk everywhere. Very happy with our experience! Tom/Andy
Very nicely done and very clean. Location is good and close to restaurants and trails. Quiet neighborhood at night.

We stayed at Vickie’s place just for a night as we were passing through on the way home from a long road trip. Glens Falls is a great town. We enjoyed the convenience of being so close to town that we could walk to dinner when we arrived and breakfast before hitting the road again the next day. We were traveling with young kids and grandma and the space was great for all ages.

Such a clean and comfortable space to call home for the night. So close and convenient to attractions, especially the awesome farmers market on Saturday morning!! Vickie was very thorough and communicative prior to our stay and let us know about all the local spots to eat and enjoy. 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a spot in the Glen's Falls area.

Close to walk to everything downtown. Apartment was very clean.
Recommend coffee at Kru and dinner at Farmacy!!
The perfect air bnb experience with nothing to complain about

The apartment is perfectly appointed with a charming artist’s loft theme. It’s located on a quiet neighborhood street just a few blocks away from downtown. We walked to a great coffee place (Spot), enjoyed the Crandall Library and City Park, and grabbed a shake from Stewart’s.
There’s a ton of great shopping and restaurants in the area.
Great apt., great location, great host. I would absolutely stay there again.

The Loft was the perfect stay for us; very clean/spacious and we loved being within walking distance to everything Glen Falls has to offer; restaurants, breweries, coffee shop and farmers market. Very short drive to the Track and Lake George. Vickie was great to work with and offered a lot of suggestions of things to do.
Her communication was quick!
We will be back soon.... Thanks again Vickie.

We were so lucky this place was available. It is just perfect: central to everything, clean and quiet. It has the charm of an old home with updated furnishings. The fact that there is a sign at the entrance asking us to remove our shoes before going upstairs made it feel that much cleaner and cozy. We will be back, for sure!

It was the perfect spot for our needs close to downtown and was easy to get to .
She was helpful with any questions we had.
Only down fall was if you want to sleep in bring eye covers sunshines bright in the bedrooms.
Cute, clean, and convenient to downtown Glen Falls. Vickie was an excellent host! Loved her restaurant recommendations. Perfect for a small group of friends for the weekend.
Vickie has a lovely, spacious place that's walking distance to downtown Glen Falls and a quick drive to Lake George. We had a lovely weekend at her place!

Great location. Only a couple blocks from the main strip with lots of great restaurants. Unfortunately, we had to check out early so we did not stay the night. We hope to go back so we can actually stay the night! Vicki was very responsive. The place was spotless.

Great stay, this was the second time we stayed at Vickie's - great location, spotless, kitchen has everything you need. The pictures are very accurate. Great location, walkable to several restaurants, the farmers market on Saturday and an easy drive to Lake George. We've already booked the apartment for another visit with family in the area!

Loft was perfect size for my trip and conveniently located right in the heart of downtown, walking distance from all the restaurants and shops. It was remote enough to be private and quiet. The space itself is unique and fun to be in, but also very functional. Was a great spot and would stay again!

We had a great stay (girls get-away). We walked to restaurants, farmers market, and and art show. We attended a concert at SPAC and the drive was easy. Vicki gave us a great recommendation that helped us get in and out of the concert easier too. We enjoyed our time at Vicki's place!

Vickie’s 2 bedroom apartment was comfortable, clean, and thoughtfully stocked with everything you might need. We were in town to spend time with family and was the perfect place to stay. Vickie is approachable and very communicative. We’ve already reserved for next month!
Great stay for a weekend away. Would recommend to friends and family.

We had a great time staying at Vickie’s loft. Vickie had everything we needed and the place was immaculate. The location was great as we were able to walk to shops and restaurants. Vickie gave us great recommendations and welcomed us with some snacks and a beautiful picture of the local area. We highly recommend Vickie’s loft!
Great place that met our needs for the HS Basketball Championship weekend.
Thanks Vicky we had a wonderful time. With much appreciation. See you again

My daughters and I were met with a welcoming and inviting environment. The little things that Vickie paid attention to, such as leaving snacks on the counter (a variety that included treats for all ages), and easy listening music I felt were the extra touches that are very often overlooked. If I had an inquiry, Vickie responded within minutes, and was always able to accommodate.
If ever looking to spend time anywhere near the Lake George area, I’m confident in saying, you won’t find a better place.
Incidentally, I’ve never written a review.
Sincerely, Pat, Payton, and Naomi
Perfect spot in Lake George, close to restaurants, breweries, events, and hiking trails.
The apartment was updated, clean and well stocked. I’d definitely stay again!
Great place in downtown Glens Falls. Host did a great job of communicating all the details. Loft apartment was very clean and was a perfect place to stay.

Vicki is a wonderful host. She gave us great recommendations for activities and dining and was very responsive. The unit is roomy and well stocked. The location is very near many great restaurants - all walkable. Make sure to check out the Sat market too.
We had a great stay here. Vickie's communication was extremely clear and the house was great. Good location with easy access to all the restaurants and bars in the area.
The loft was spacious and well equipped. Instructions for access were easy to follow. Vickie was responsive and kind. We had everything we needed for a cozy stop on a rainy roadtrip!
Wonderful location close great restaurants

great spot, awesome accomodations with updated style. very comfy layout and furniture including the beds. stayed 2 nights for our anniversary and loved how close to downtown GF this was, but also a short drive to the lake and all that has to offer.

Great location! We really enjoyed this cute loft apartment. It has a great atmosphere, low price and is so close to the downtown restaurants. We were in town for the Hot Air Balloon fest and had a wonderful time!
We had a great weekend at Vickies loft - perfect location for walking around town, plenty of room for us three and very comfortable setting!
Great place to spend the night. Very clean and comfortable!
The stay was great. It was clean and worked for our needs. Vickie was wonderful helping as a first time renter. We will be back next year.
We really enjoyed staying at your loft. The beds were very comfortable and the place was really clean. Check in was super easy. Thanks!
Place was exactly as pictured and described. Very clean and the bed was very comfortable! Would book again in the future

Awesome place right in downtown Glens Falls. Loved being able to walk everyday to get coffee and lunch. Vickie made it very welcoming with all the little details, like A/C and lights turned on and som welcome snacks.

Best Airbnb we’ve stayed at! It was extremely clean, the beds were comfy, it was in a fantastic location, all was great! We loved the farmers market on Saturday and the drive to Lake George is very easy. Vicky was so kind to leave out some snacks for us and welcome us with the tv playing music. I would absolutely stay again.

A wonderful place to spend a few nights when visiting the area. Apartment is modern, clean, has very good AC and is well located for visits in Glens Falls and Saratoga Springs areas. Vickie’s place is very tastefully decorated, she has a special eye for art, kitchen is bright and has everything one needs for eating or cooking meals. Beds are wonderful, bathroom is great with clean and fluffy towels.
We will be back !
Our loft was immaculate and had everything you could possibly need. Vickie was attentive to our needs and made sure our stay was perfect!
Great little apartment with a clean, freshly-renovated feel and lots of nice little touches like matched pillow sets and toiletries. Huge closets and nicely laid out, functional small kitchen.

this is an incredible gem! The loft is a place we hope to visit again. Beautiful, artsy and full of natural light, we enjoyed every minute of our stay. Bed was comfy, sweet snacks greeted us on arrival, amenities were great, and Vickie was super at communicating. highly reccomend!!

Great stay! Vickie’s place is clean, comfortable with modern amenities and in a quiet neighborhood. She was great at communicating all check in/out instructions as well as providing recommendations in the area.

This Airbnb unit is even better than the pictures can relay. It is very well-equipped and so clean. The decor is great. It is on a quiet street but within walking distance to restaurants . We chose this unit due to its proximity to Lake George and Saratoga Springs ( both of which we visited) . The framed photos are fantastic.

Our family of three stayed here for ten days and didn’t want to leave. The light in the second floor apartment is fantastic. The kitchen was well supplied for home cooking. The bedrooms are spacious with desks and strong wifi for working and it was super convenient to have a full washer and dryer.

We loved Vickie’s place. It was clean, bright with natural light and really beautiful. The location was great to walk for coffee and breakfast, dinner and bars. We were back and forth to SPAC for back to back concerts and the drive was easy. Oh and when we arrived the lights were on, the acs and fans were at the perfect temp and the jazz station was on every tv playing softly …, just a really cool and thoughtful touch.
Looks like we found the perfect Airbnb for all of our SPAC concerts and hiking weekends in the Adirondacks!
Beautiful stay that was close to everything! Loved walking into the air bnb listening to spa music and sparkling water/snacks. One of the best places I have stayed!

Vickie responded quickly and made sure we had everything we needed for our stay. The space is clean and comfortable, the kitchen has everything you need, the beds slept well, and the shower pressure and temperature was great. The loft is located in walking distance to restaurants and short drive to hiking trails.
The loft was perfect for 4 of us girls. Walking distance to so many places! Vickie is an excellent host!
Vickie was a wonderful host and shared hiking spots for us as we explored the area and enjoyed the local arts district. This place was perfect, had all we needed, was clean and comfortable.

Vickie's place was perfect to attend a wedding in Glens Falls. The location is very walkable to all the restaurants/shops in the area and there is a little museum right around the corner. The apartment itself was very cute and clean, and there was even a welcome basket of snacks. Keypad check-in was convenient, and Vickie was easy to communicate with. We would stay here again.

The place was extremely clean and comfortable. Vickie was incredibly responsiveness. Location is not only walking distance to Glen Falls, but close to Queensbury (hiking), Saratoga Springs (spa, food, shopping), and Lake George (water).

The apartment was clean, comfortable and tastefully decorated. This is a great central Andirondack location and a cute downtown area within a few blocks, great for dinner and drinks. Vickie is an excellent host and very responsive. I highly recommend staying here and taking advantage of all the area has to offer!
Very clean apartment and a very comfortable stay. Well provided with cooking condiments, lots of snacks, coffee and tea. Highly recommended a stay with short drive to Lake George.
Phenomenal stay! As described and an excellent host. One of the best stays I've had.

Fabulous stay, this was our first trip to the area and when we come back we hope to stay here again. Vickie is a wonderful host and her place is updated, very clean and has all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay. She was easy to communicate with, very responsive, and provided ideas on things to do in the area. The location is perfect if you want to walk to the many shops and restaurants in Glens Falls and very convenient to drive to Lake George for the day, about 15 minutes and we were right by the lake.
Nice place, good location
A very nice apartment with lots of natural light, comfortable beds, and pleasant amenities. I recommend it.
Nice and clean. Centrally located in a cute town. Perfect for a weekend getaway.
Great spot. Location is perfect. Loft is super cute and clean.

Wonderful stay at a great apartment. A light-filled, comfortable, well appointed, spacious, quiet apartment in a perfect location. Vickie is accommodating, helpful and generous. I couldn’t have asked for more!

Communication with Vickie ahead of my stay was great! Checking in directions were clear and check in was easy. The space was cozy and clean, had everything we needed, and was in a great location. Would definitely stay here again!

This trip was booked for my employee who was in town to take a licensing test. She said the space was gorgeous and comfortable. We had a storm hit and Vickie was very accommodating to our unexpected schedule change.

We had a great stay at Vickie's place. It is so nicely decorated and has everything you need. Vickie was very accommodating and easy to communicate with. It was so nice to have some snacks she provided when we arrived. There are many restaurants to walk to. It's a quick and easy drive to Lake George.
This a beautiful place. Spacious and clean, with all amenities one would need. Easily walkable to town locations. Perfect stay.
Perfect place for a weekend getaway! The loft was in walking distance of downtown with lots of restaurants, shops and bars. We highly recommend Vickie and the loft!
Very easy assess to everything to lake George 15mins, to west mountain 15mins, and lots of restaurant walkable distance in glen falls!

This was a great little getaway! It was a great loft; clean and comfortable! Vickie replied quickly to my messages to her. She was even able to make a lot of great recommendations for places in the area! We enjoyed the indoor Farmers Market, tubing at West Mountain, and taking a ride into Lake George for the winter carnival!
You can walk everywhere in downtown Glens Falls here, it was fabulous!
Absolutely wonderful! The loft was extremely clean, chic, and spacious! You truly can not beat the location!

Vickie’s loft was wonderful! Upon arrival, Vickie shared all of the needed details ahead of our check-in, including recommended spots to visit in town. The loft was spacious, extremely clean, and closely located to spots in town. The Farmers Market on Saturday was directly behind the loft which was amazing! We will definitely be looking to stay here again when we come next Fall. Highly recommend!
Great spot, super clean and comfortable. Right in downtown you can walk to lots of restaurants quickly. Super nice would definitely stay again!
Excellent!! We loved the Saturday morning farmers market! Very spacious, clean, and had everything we might need.
Well designed, uncluttered, and immaculate with everything you need for a pleasant stay. The location is perfect for access to the biking trails and downtown.
A great location in a quiet downtown neighborhood -- easy walk to great restaurants and other downtown attractions. Would definitely stay here again.
Host was very accommodating and hospitable. Place was great!!
It was a really nice and large house they have bunch of storages if you are hosting there more than 3 days and with 4 people I would definetely recommend this house

This was our first time using an Air BnB and it went great. Better than expected. Our host was prompt with communication and got right back to us with any questions. She even let us know the apt was ready a little early. The location was great, just off the main drag and around the corner from the shops/resturants in Glens Falls. Our stay was very quiet and relaxing. I really liked the bedding and towels and the fact that there was many places to hang a towel. Something you do not get in a hotel. Decor was nice, the washer/dryer was a plus. There was an iron/hair dryer, hands-soap etc. Very nice. We would recommend this place and Vickie. Thank you.
The place was great! Everything looked new and it was super clean. Loved the decor, With interesting black and white photography. Location was perfect.
We had a lovely stay. Very convenient to everything. Vickie was a great host!
Everything is very close and the people in the area are super nice! I highly recommend this air b n b
Vickie’s place is newly renovated, lovely, just as described, within walking distance of downtown, and has everything you could need! I highly recommend it and will come back when in the area!
Great apartment. Location is close to walking downtown. It was very clean and looked just like the photos! We really enjoyed our stay - having a full kitchen was SO nice.
good spot as always

Wow - great location to explore the little town of Glens Falls. The place was clean and had everything we needed for our stay. We walked to town, and then Saratoga and Lake George were only 20 minutes away. Really great value.
Great location great price very clean and private. A lot of options in walking distance. I would definitely stay again
Perfect spot, especially if you are in Glens Falls without a car - very walkable, and a great stay!

Perfect place to stay! The location is right in the center of everything you could want or need. Every room was very clean and decorated in such a fun way. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Glens Falls. It definitely exceeded our expectations!

the loft was absolutely incredible! it was within walking distance of so many great restaurants, bars, and activities. it was clean and tidy, smelled incredible, and so comfortable to spend the night. The art was a wonderful addition to the space and tied together the appeal of the loft. Vickie was very accommodating and kind! 1000/10 would recommend!
The loft is beautiful and even better than the pictures. It's spotlessly clean, perfectly located, spacious, and very stylish. Stay here; you won't regret it!
very nice and welcoming. 10/10 because exactly as described
To get into the place is very easy. The place is very clean. Very good Internet has an amazing washer and dryer. Very close to activities food and entertainment during
A very clean and welcoming environment. Felt right at home.
The stay was amazing! It really feels like a home. The arts district is about 5 mins away on foot with plenty to do. There are also great natural parks nearby which I enjoyed a lot.
Great place to stay , near everything. Was quiet and comfortable and very nice decor!! Host was always available and helpful!! Highly recommend the Loft!!

An amazing host with an amazing space that was beyond our wildest dreams! Everything was on point, exceptionally clean, very accommodating, amazing things to do around the area led by the information that Vickie gave us. It has an incredibly stunning layout with The design and photography on the wall. Also, having parking which is key! Staying at the loft made our weekend exponentially better. Thank you again
A wonderful gem so close to lake George!

Vickie's place is beautiful, spacious, and full of light. It's just a couple of blocks from downtown so you can walk just about anywhere you need to go. We had a great stay and would definitely go back!
Lovely place -- clean, cute and super convenient to downtown :)

This is an amazing find for Glenn's Falls. First, it's in a great location - you can walk to a variety of shops, restaurants, bars etc. The space is wonderful and worked great for us. We appreciated the snacks and coffee supplied, washer and dryer and we always appreciate an air bnb stocked with pots and pans and also essential cooking silverware which most forget. This would be a great longer stay

My boyfriend and I stayed here for our recent trip to Lake George. The apartment was located conveniently near the center of Glen Falls, so everywhere we went we only had to do 1 or 2 turns to get to a main highway. Furthermore, there is a very convenient route down Bay St. about 1 mile to the Warren County Bikeway that takes you 8 miles straight to Lake George. This trail is uphill both ways so be sure to tune up your bike beforehand. We ate at the Wishing Well (15 min), the Dancing Ewe Farm with Chef Jody Somers (30 min), and Farmacy (5 min walk) so the location of the apartment was very convenient. Vickie was very responsive and gave us recommendations for food and things to do in the area. The apartment was very clean and the kitchen was stocked with essential dishes and there were plenty of linens. For things to do, I’d recommend Adirondack Extreme Adventure Ropes Course (30 min), Fort William Henry (15 min), Adirondack Axe (10 min), Glen Falls Drive in (10 min), Body Relief Spa (10 min), Prospect Mountain (15 min), and Lake George Outlets (15 min). I would not recommend Goony Golf if your kids are over 5 years old, basically the same thing over and over. Be sure to ask locals for recommendations, that’s where we found the best food and things to do on our vacation. This apartment was the perfect basecamp and the laundry comes in very handy for a longer stay or if you are being active.

The apartment is clean, beautifully appointed, and well stocked. It’s located within walking distance from the park, library, and all the great restaurants, cafes, and shops in downtown Glens Falls.
The host communicated well, provided great instructions, and was very responsive.
I would highly recommend this stay and will keep it on my short list when I return to the area.
Good value for money.
Fabulous!!! Everything was as pictured. Clean, classy, and comfortable. Thank you again Karen and family!

Great place! Super responsive host!
The house is perfect for a family. Plenty of parking. Great amenities. Walkable to downtown. Would stay again!

Loved the stay there. I was with my family and we relaxed and enjoyed. Had a chance to go to lake George since it was so close and also visited lake placid. It was cold but the Karen’s home made me feel very comfortable.
As repeat visitors, we enjoyed our stay again and will return in the future. Thanks Karen.

This home is a great find for downtown Glens Falls! The location is very walkable and the house itself is in great condition. The rooms were all very comfortable, the kitchen had everything you could need, and the hosts were super communicative and helpful. Would absolutely stay here again!

We loved our stay! We honestly only needing it for sleeping, as we spent the majority of the time at our cousin's house, but it worked perfectly. We actually wished we could have spent more time there because it was so charming! The kitchen and living area were huge and would have been great for a group. There were little touches around the house, such as tea and granola bars left out for guests, which we appreciated. We would definitely stay again!
Perfect location, house was so clean. My family had a great time.
Everything was perfect. Clean, spacious. We were 4 adults, very comfortable. Everything is there. Karen responds very quickly when we communicate with her. No worries. Thank you Karen.

We were very happy with our stay! My stepdaughter got married at the Hiland Club! This house was very comfortable and convenient for the activities for our weekend!
What I really liked about the house!
I liked that the owners thought about everything..
I have stayed at air b and b 's before and I had to buy garbage bags, soap, laundry soap etc! We did not have to use everything they had at the house.. but it was nice to know it was there...

That was hugh for me!
We were very happy!
If we ever needed to be back in the area! We would stay again 100%
Very comfortable and clean.
Overall, it was a great place to stay. Close to downtown, clean, easy to find, great living space.

I was sad to leave this place! I wish it were my home. Thank you so much to Karen and her team for making this stay such an enjoyable one. It was better than expected, would 100% recommend to anyone, and would absolutely stay here again if in the area.
Great location and we had all the amenities of home!

The house is very clean, comfortable and in a great location. The owner is very responsive. The first morning we found the coffee maker carafe was leaking. I messaged and we had a new coffee maker later that morning. We would definately stay here again.
The place was very nice and clean. Karen gave clear instructions on check and in and check out and we had no issues. Would recommend for anyone visiting Glens Falls area.
Super comfortable, clean and convenient! Would highly recommend!!!

This was a great house! We were in town for the weekend for a softball tournament and the house fit all our needs perfectly! And it was cheaper than hotel rooms! It was also walking distance to lovely downtown Glens Falls- so nice!
Thank you, Karen!
It was a very pleasant stay. I would recommend Karen's place.
Great place to stay clean neat and well organized located close to everything and so much to do
The place was great! Everything is labeled in the kitchen, so you know where it is. Would stay here again for sure!
We had a good time.

Karen is among the greatest hosts we have stayed at in the past year. What we care about is the communication, smooth check in and out, as well as a clean and spacious kitchen to use during the stay. Karen has done a great job in all of them. Not to mention the recommendations for local attractions. Throughout the house, we could feel the love and care from the owner and the house was more than ready for our stay.
We explored Glenn falls, lake George and Queensbury. Our family's favorite range from the great escape park (despite it was on a really hot day), the boat tour on lake George, or the prospect mountain. Wish we had more time for what the area has to offer.
Would recommend Karen's house to anyone!
The house was perfect for us! Great location and very comfortable. We loved it
It’s rare that a place exceeds my expectations. Karen’s Airbnb was all that and a bag of chips. It was wonderful. I would’ve gladly paid more.

We loved our stay!!! The perfect house for a perfect weekend! Besides the house being perfect, Karen was even better! Extremely responsive with any quick question we may have had. I couldn’t recommend a better place to stay in lake George.

The location was perfect.The house was clean and well-maintained. The host was friendly and helpful. The house had everything we needed for a comfortable stay, including a fully equipped kitchen and a washer/dryer.
I would definitely stay at Sittin' On Bay again if I ever visit Glens Falls.
Karen is very thoughtful. We will stay with her again if we ever go back to the area.
Thank you Karen and team for a wonderful experience. I will definitely recommend this to my friends and family. Perfectly located for Lake George and surrounding area activities.

Karen was great
Clean place i will go back for sure
Very clean home with lots of space, and a perfect location to downtown glens falls. The parking was also very easy
Perfect rental!
In town for an event at SUNY. Super easy location to get there and back. Clean and comfortable.

Very comfortable and cozy home. We had 2 couples plus a friend.. so 5 of us and had lotS of room to enjoy. Close to restaurants and Park theatre where we saw a great show. Enjoyed cross country skiing and snowshoeing nearby. House was clean and had many amenities for cooking and eating in as well. Karen was very responsive and answered our questions promptly.
We had a comfortable stay at Karen’s place. She was a good communicator.
Great location and comfortable space.

This is such a cozy and accommodating house. The people who own it truly care about the home and care about being wonderful hosts. The house has several convenient amenities and it’s proximity to the fun activities in the area is just perfect. Thanks so much to Karen.
The neighborhood is nice and the house is spacious. Check-in process is very smooth

Everything was just fine - all as promised.
We really liked it.
Every time again!
We had a great stay, great location.

The house is in a great location in Glenn Falls with a convenient walk to restaurants and downtown. We were able to ride on the Warren County Bikeway to Lake George one day and south to Fort Edward on the canal another. It's located in a quiet neighborhood with lots of parking in the back. House/kitchen if well furnished and had everything we needed. The check in/out instructions were clear and easy to follow. It's was nice to sit on the porch in the evenings and relax. Karen was very responsive to questions and even made the garage available for us to store our bikes. Highly recommend.

Great house, lovely and clean and had everything you could wish for. Really excellent host who answered every question and gave lots of advice to help with our stay. Will definitely come again if in the area.

I stayed with my Famly; wife; 2 sons; 6 and 13 and mother-in-law. Our goal was to have a reasonably priced stay to visit Six Flags and Lake George. The house fit the bill perfectly. The house was all that was advertised. It is on a local main road, but not a big deal.
Great location, extremely clean, and well furnished.

The hosts are very responsive and the house was perfect for our weekend away, very clean, kitchen and bathrooms have everything you need. Our family enjoyed sitting on the front porch and playing the board games. We will definitely look to stay here our next trip to the area!

Sitting on the Bay house is in a great location in Glenn Falls. It is close to Lake George but out of the tourist chaos. It's located in a quiet neighborhood with parking in the back. The check in and out instructions and information was so easy and straight forward with all questions answered upfront. The home is cute and clean and well organized. - Very comfortable rooms (good AC, rooms are nice and clean, and big enough)
- Includes a lot of "the little things" that were done exceptionally well (body wash and shampoo/conditioner dispensers, fans in every room, towel racks, easy door lock set-up, easy parking, little tea packets)
- Great communication with the owner; very clearly laid out expectations
Had a wonderful time!
The host has kept the house in immaculate condition. The host has nicely furnished every room of the house. Interaction with the host was delightful. I always got a very prompt and helpful response.

Great spot/ location and less than 15 minutes away from Lake George. Fantastic vegan restaurants close by, Birch Bark eatery had delicious vegan donuts and only about 3-4 minutes from this property.
